```
bc getrawtransation 65910a2ea90391d1d19be66ef8b1718cecbb49fc48887f743d6a099f869b08f3





      version(always 4 bytes):  01000000      -> little endian
              count of inputs:  01            -> compactSize
        txid(always 32 bytes):  913f3edcafa48bcd5742225a752f3dd8cef35596dfb0fce551c5b455ce0a02d6      ->
                output number:  3b000000      -> little endian (always 8-bytes)  (59)
  scriptSig(unlocking script):  6a 473044022062f4f61766e1edf89b9b94d0629d67bfefb62e6ffec63f17d0f10ce5e329dbf4022039d566558c1f98742345e70b194bbcb8b8fff5b7fa2f0507c9f31a5a2ea24749012103fc3e6b07b7bec800cb0861c172344687d146888aaf0f811eaca8b1ef6684c9fc
                    nSequence:  00000080      -> fixed 4-bytes

             count of outputs:  02            -> compactSize field
                       amount:  f07e0e0000000000  ->how much bitcoin is this "output" worth  (always 8-bytes  little endians)
 scriptPubkey(locking script):  17 a914783b39e49c6b6544a51bf0cbd4f47eef116be81987      ->(variable length  bit endians)

                       amount:  e0ec040000000000
 scriptPubkey(locking script):  19 76a91456c0bc2f50bc150d4ea122e66db7c48b01b9722988ac
                    nlocktime:  00000000      -> 4-bytes fixed

                    fixed are always little endians
```


python 相关操作：
``` python
int(bytes.fromhex('e0ec040000000000')[::-1].hex(),16) + int(bytes.fromhex('f07e0e0000000000')[::-1].hex(),16)
```
